DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : 1 . Signed informed consent obtain . 2 . Males age 18 45 , inclusive . 3 . Body weight range 50 100 kg BMI range 18 32 ( kg/m2 ) , inclusive . 4 . Healthy free significant abnormal finding determine medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory value , vital sign , ECG . Exclusion Criteria include : 1 . Current recent ( within 5 year ) history drug alcohol abuse . 2 . History current condition might interfere drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion . 3 . Any history frequent nausea emesis regardless etiology . 4 . Any history allergictype reaction sulfonamide , experience asthma , urticarial , allergictype reaction take aspirin NSAIDS . 5 . Subjects develop erythema maximum dose UVB source ( MED determination UVB model ) exclude study . Other protocolspecific inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
